segment.source: Download the latest firmware and drivers for Surface devices (Surface)
segment.target: Download the latest firmware and drivers for Surface devices (Surface)

segment.source: This article provides a list of the available downloads for Surface devices and links to download the drivers and firmware for your device.
segment.target: This article provides a list of the available downloads for Surface devices and links to download the drivers and firmware for your device.

segment.source: update Surface, newest, latest, download, firmware, driver, tablet, hardware, device
segment.target: update Surface, newest, latest, download, firmware, driver, tablet, hardware, device

segment.source: Download the latest firmware and drivers for Surface devices
segment.target: Download the latest firmware and drivers for Surface devices

segment.source: This article provides a list of the available downloads for Surface devices and links to download the drivers and firmware for your device.
segment.target: This article provides a list of the available downloads for Surface devices and links to download the drivers and firmware for your device.

segment.source: As easy as it is to keep Surface device drivers and firmware up to date automatically with Windows Update, it is sometimes necessary to download and install updates manually, such as during a Windows deployment.
segment.target: As easy as it is to keep Surface device drivers and firmware up to date automatically with Windows Update, it is sometimes necessary to download and install updates manually, such as during a Windows deployment.

segment.source: For any situation where you need to install drivers and firmware separately from Windows Update, you can find the files available for download at the Microsoft Download Center.
segment.target: For any situation where you need to install drivers and firmware separately from Windows Update, you can find the files available for download at the Microsoft Download Center.

segment.source: On the Microsoft Download Center page for your device, you will find several files available.
segment.target: On the Microsoft Download Center page for your device, you will find several files available.

segment.source: These files allow you to deploy drivers and firmware in various ways.
segment.target: These files allow you to deploy drivers and firmware in various ways.

segment.source: You can read more about the different deployment methods for Surface drivers and firmware in Manage Surface driver and firmware updates.
segment.target: You can read more about the different deployment methods for Surface drivers and firmware in Manage Surface driver and firmware updates.

segment.source: Driver and firmware updates for Surface devices are released in one of two ways:
segment.target: Driver and firmware updates for Surface devices are released in one of two ways:

segment.source: Point updates are released for specific drivers or firmware revisions and provide the latest update for a specific component of the Surface device.
segment.target: Point updates are released for specific drivers or firmware revisions and provide the latest update for a specific component of the Surface device.

segment.source: Cumulative updates provide comprehensive roundups of all of the latest files for the Surface device running that version of Windows.
segment.target: Cumulative updates provide comprehensive roundups of all of the latest files for the Surface device running that version of Windows.

segment.source: Installation files for administrative tools, drivers for accessories, and updates for Windows are also available for some devices and are detailed here in this article.
segment.target: Installation files for administrative tools, drivers for accessories, and updates for Windows are also available for some devices and are detailed here in this article.

segment.source: Note:To simplify the process of locating drivers for your device, downloads for Surface devices have been reorganized to separate pages for each model.
segment.target: Note:To simplify the process of locating drivers for your device, downloads for Surface devices have been reorganized to separate pages for each model.

segment.source: Bookmark the Microsoft Download Center page for your device from the links provided on this page.
segment.target: Bookmark the Microsoft Download Center page for your device from the links provided on this page.

segment.source: Many of the filenames contain a placeholder denoted with xxxxxx, which identifies the current version number or date of the file.
segment.target: Many of the filenames contain a placeholder denoted with xxxxxx, which identifies the current version number or date of the file.

segment.source: Recent additions to the downloads for Surface devices provide you with options to install Windows 10 on your Surface devices and update LTE devices with the latest Windows 10 drivers and firmware.
segment.target: Recent additions to the downloads for Surface devices provide you with options to install Windows 10 on your Surface devices and update LTE devices with the latest Windows 10 drivers and firmware.

segment.source: Note:A battery charge of 40% or greater is required before you install firmware to a Surface device.
segment.target: Note:A battery charge of 40% or greater is required before you install firmware to a Surface device.

segment.source: See Microsoft Support article KB2909710 for more information.
segment.target: See Microsoft Support article KB2909710 for more information.

segment.source: Surface Book
segment.target: Surface Book

segment.source: Download the following updates for Surface Book from the Microsoft Download Center.
segment.target: Download the following updates for Surface Book from the Microsoft Download Center.

segment.source: SurfaceBook\_Win10\_xxxxxx.msi – Cumulative firmware and driver update package for Windows 10
segment.target: SurfaceBook\_Win10\_xxxxxx.msi – Cumulative firmware and driver update package for Windows 10

segment.target: Wintab-xxxxx-64-bit.zip – Tablet driver update for all supported x64-based versions of Windows 8.1

segment.source: There are no downloadable firmware or driver updates available for Surface RT.
segment.target: There are no downloadable firmware or driver updates available for Surface RT.

segment.source: Updates can only be applied using Windows Update.
segment.target: Updates can only be applied using Windows Update.

segment.source: If you have additional questions on the driver pack and updates, please contact Microsoft Surface support for business.
segment.target: If you have additional questions on the driver pack and updates, please contact Microsoft Surface support for business.
